Act1Scene3Part1b.speaker: Banquo
Act1Scene3Part1b.text: The earth hath bubbles, as the water has, and these are of them. Whither are they vanished?
Act1Scene3Part1b.translation: The earth has bubbles, like the water has, and these are some of them. Where have they gone?

Act1Scene3Part1b.speaker: Macbeth
Act1Scene3Part1b.text: Into the air, and what seemed corporal melted, as breath into the wind. Would they had stayed!
Act1Scene3Part1b.translation: They vanished into thin air, like a breath of wind. I wish they had stayed to tell me more!

Act1Scene3Part1b.speaker: Banquo
Act1Scene3Part1b.text: Were such things here as we do speak about? Or have we eaten on the insane root That takes the reason prisoner?
Act1Scene3Part1b.translation: Did we really see what we think we saw? Or have we eaten some crazy plant that makes us hallucinate?

Act1Scene3Part1b.speaker: Banquo
Act1Scene3Part1b.text: And Thane of Cawdor too. Went it not so?
Act1Scene3Part1b.translation: And Thane of Cawdor too. Isn't that right?

Act1Scene3Part1b.speaker: Banquo
Act1Scene3Part1b.text: To th’ selfsame tune and words. —Who’s here?
Act1Scene3Part1b.translation: In the same way and with the same words. —Who goes there?
